page.title: 07Clapham Cubs
page.content: At Cubs we have Peter Smith as Tricky Ricky and at the start, while we group, we have a game of football and my mum collects the invested Cubs' subs. That is 2Op. After we have grouped together each six has inspection to get points. Then we form into a horseshoe shape after one of the leaders says, Pack, pack alert; pack, pack, pack! And we all shout, PACK! One of the leaders says who is duty six before we start grand howl. The person who is chosen to do grand howl says, Cubs do their best. And we all say, we will do our best. We all face the flag and the person who was chosen to do the flag pulls the rope. We all salute at the flag. We then take off our caps and we usually play a game. Dodgeball is my favourite because you have to dodge the ball.
